suppress.notes: file name: applicationinsights-core-2.1.2.jar Depends on guava, but can't be updated at the moment.

file name: spring-security-rsa-1.0.8.RELEASE.jar This has been updated, but it still shown some vulnerabilities that shouldn't be there Issue reported on the DependencyCheck GitHub repo https://github.com/jeremylong/DependencyCheck/issues/1665
file name: jersey-apache-client4-1.19.1.jar Depending on springOpenFeign, which if updated, makes the build fail

file name: spring-security-rsa-1.0.8.RELEASE.jar file name: spring-security-crypto-5.1.3.RELEASE.jar If the application does not use Spring Framework 5.0.5.RELEASE then it is not impacted. Spring Boot 2.1.2 uses Spring Framework 5.1.4
This is exploitable in com.zaxxer.hikari.HikariConfig and com.zaxxer.hikari.HikariDataSource which we do not use. Pending the release of a stable jackson databind version (>2.9.9.3)
To address gradle-pitest-plugin, suppressing until a suitable solution is found. Suppressed on 20/09/2019
Ignoring app insights netty errors as it's not used
